title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, with a total of 20 data points.
Overall Unemployment rate has decreased over the Year
Unemployment rate is slightly constant from 2000 to 2008, gradually increasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly constant from 2009 to 2017, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
Max Unemployment rate about 7.5 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Unemployment rate about 2.7 was recorded at Year 2019
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unemployment rate, with a total of 20 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2000 to 2007.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2019.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2007 to 2013.
